channel.title: CVE Feed for plugincraft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for plugincraft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0294|2024-08-02T05:02:44.178Z -- plugincraft -- mediamatic%20%E2%80%93%20media%20library%20folders
item.description: The Mediamatic – Media Library Folders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 2.8.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on its AJAX actions function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change image categories used by the plugin, via forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2023-0293|2024-08-02T05:02:44.153Z -- plugincraft -- mediamatic%20%E2%80%93%20media%20library%20folders
item.description: The Mediamatic – Media Library Folders plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass due to a missing capability check on its AJAX actions in versions up to, and including, 2.8.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to change image categories, which it uses to arrange them in folder views.
